abstract: Dissident Yahoo investor Eric Jackson urged fellow shareholders on Monday to vote for a board comprising five existing directors and four nominees from billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s slate.
lead_paragraph: Dissident Yahoo investor Eric Jackson urged fellow shareholders on Monday to vote for a board comprising five existing directors and four nominees from billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s slate.

headline.main: Yahoo Shareholder Proposes Compromise on Icahn Slate
